channel.title: Operation Flash Point: Dragon rising. 56k Warning
channel.description:
Anyone played this yet? The gaming community i'm in has uploaded the full English DVD onto their FTP.. So im downloading.. Only downside is my connection is being gay and everytime i start downloading stuff it goes off.. Last night i had 2.4gb downloaded out of 4.4 and it cut off :S
Yea so from what ive seen.. Not only you can call in artillery. But you can set it to Accurate or Skatter shot
Trailers:
CO-OP [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QHnXK3twNz0&feature=fvst]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QHnXK3twNz0&feature=fvst[/url]
VEHICLES [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vuetCSJmx0w&feature=fvst]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vuetCSJmx0w&feature=fvst [/url]
MULTIPLAYER [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfPPvcDjk_A]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfPPvcDjk_A[/url]
Anyhow to get to the game... here are some screens: [b]56K WARNING[/b]
[IMG]http://i12.photobucket.com/albums/a202/Jiralhanae/OFDR2009-10-0703-32-11-37.png[/img]

Ill Edit this thread and post more info when i have more time

item.title: Operation Flash Point: Dragon rising. 56k Warning
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:20, topic:308296”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=404537.msg2995993#msg2995993 date=1255596350]

TheBeanie you got FTP access to a scene release group?

Is that a serious question or are you just being stupid?

well good torrent users soemtime get scene release groups FTP to filter their releases out i was wondering if you had one like that guess not
Anyway: hard game is fucking hard, the first mission took like 10 attempts

If you find the first mission hard… Wait till you have to defend the village from attack with like 30+ guys +5+ jeeps

[/quote]This mission is impossible.[/quote]

Apparently what you do is place one of you guys on the southeast facing HMG and one on the south facing machine gun and then just order em to shoot the guys… Havent tried this yet buh apparently it works.

Oh and your supposed to keep at least on ARV alive

Read full topic

item.title: Operation Flash Point: Dragon rising. 56k Warning
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

haticks:

I rented it for the 360, and its definitely the most realistic war game ive ever player…But its so damn hard Which is good tho, better than it being easy.

I was watching the developers play it… they said all the nato weapons are REAL sounds… they went out into the NEVADA desert and fire em … the other ones, Chinese weapons for instance they had to make as china wouldnt let em use it.

Apparently REAL military strategies will work in this… and no matter what difficulty your playing, bullet damage and speed will stay the same.
Bullet speeds and velocities are apparently realisticly sound too.

Anyhow… still stuck on mission 3… i dont get how your suppose to bring all the APC’s through… i go really fast and kill the AT teams buh some of em are still destroyed… you dont fail the mission but it makes defending the village a whole lot harder… Still havent passed it yet lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Operation Flash Point: Dragon rising. 56k Warning
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Yea ive installed now…

Played 2 missions on single player… Seems pretty awesome… Loving the Infra red night scopes calling in artilery is pretty cool too.

Drivings cool… The brakes on vehicles are realistic… They dont stop the car straight away… And you have to brake and then let go of brake and press it again to reverse…

All in all… Worth a Download.

ALSO. THIS GAME REQUIRES NO CD-KEY… WHICH MEANS ITS PLAYABLE ONLINE!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Operation Flash Point: Dragon rising. 56k Warning

item.title: Operation Flash Point: Dragon rising. 56k Warning
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Oh is this version for the PC? That might be better for me.

My main complaint about the 360 version is I was playing it in my room on my small (maybe 30" CRT TV) and the text on the latest games is sooo freaking hard to read.

Read full topic

item.title: Operation Flash Point: Dragon rising. 56k Warning
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I’ve heard it was the most realistic war game.

I’ve been playing it for about a week, didn’t get far in the campaign, it’s actually kinda hard on Normal. Half the times I’ve died have been friendly fire though. The first time I played I died within the first minute and before the first enemy because one of my soldiers went berserk right behind me and fired a round into my head.

Read full topic
